Say the movie begins with Samantha's funeral. A big photograph of her displayed at the funeral. Although sad and not ideal, it would be understood she died peacefully with her girls, Stanford, and Smith at her bedside. She also marries Smith on her deathbed. The movie continues with the girls in their never-ending New York struggles along with dealing with the aftermath of Samantha's death.
